about.subtitle: Discover the history and values of TUBA s.r.o.

section1.label: 01. Our history
section1.paragraph: TUBA s.r.o. was founded in 1991 as part of the Association of Tradesmen. Initially, it focused on trading food and condiments in tubes.
section1.statYearsDesc2: we have continuously served our customers

section2.imgAlt: Historic view of a small shop with condiments and food in tubes, with people standing at the shop window
section2.label: 02. Our beginnings
section2.paragraph: It dealt with trading tube products such as various types of mustards, ketchups, and other condiments. In 1997, it moved to the current premises of Konštrukta Trenčín on K Výstavisku street.

section3.label: 03. Development and expansion
section3.paragraph: In 1998, the Association dissolved and the company continued its activities under a single trade – Rudolf Bušo – TUBA. Gradually, we began expanding our offer with cords, eco bags, shelf papers, paper and gift bags.
section3.imgAlt: Eco bag with a leaf in the background, symbolizing range expansion

section4.label: 04. Our suppliers
section4.paragraph: Our largest suppliers are foreign manufacturing companies from EU countries, especially from the Czech Republic, Italy, Poland and Germany. We cooperate with renowned brands such as ARIA, which is our main partner.

section5.ceoQuote: We look forward to working with you!
